full_summary:
**Cognos to Power BI Data Transition**
=====================================

**Reference Number**
------------------

 cb-9123-18542699

**Tender Closing Date**
-----------------------

 * Thursday, October 2, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**About the Contract**
-------------------

 Infrastructure Canada (INFC) is seeking proposals for Cognos to Power BI Data Transition services under the Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) Supply Arrangement.

**Background**
-------------

 Infrastructure Canada requires a supplier to facilitate the transition from Cognos to Power BI. The selected supplier will:

* Provide expert consultation services to ensure a seamless transition
* Collaborate with INFC staff to identify and mitigate any challenges
* Implement a strategic plan to meet the project objectives

**Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------

 The successful proposal will be chosen based on the following evaluation factors:

* Technical capability
* Past experience with Cognos to Power BI transitions
* Cost
* Risk management
* Quality of the proposal

**Selected Supplier**
-------------------

 One (1) contract will be awarded as a result of the evaluation of the responses to this RFP.

**Additional Information**
----------------------

* Tender Documents are available on the CanadaBuys website (`https://canadabuys.canada.ca`)
* Notice of Proposed Procurement can be accessed on the Government of Canada Tenders website (`https://www.tenderswipe.net/signon.do`)
* Review Annex A - Notice of Proposed Procurement for information about the evaluation process

**Contractor Information**
----------------------

If you have any questions about the RFP or the procurement process, please contact Alexander Caro at (343) 576-3527 or via email at `procurement-approvisionnement@infc.gc.ca`.

**Documents**
--------------

 The following document is available on the CanadaBuys website:
* Solicitation No. INFC-2023-24-PS4239: (`https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9123/rfp---solicitation-no.---infc-2024-24-ps4239.pdf`)
